content: star ornament gauge materials 6 sts in 5 cm 2 30g of lion brand fifty fifty yarn needles & notions measurements 8 mm us 11 40 cm 16 circular needle one size 16 x 16 cm 6 5 x 6 5 1 marker tapestry needle abbreviations bobble - bind off cdd - centered double decrease co - cast on k - knit pm - place marker sl - slip_stitch st/sts - stitch/stitches pattern co 55 sts pm and join to knit in the round *k4 cdd k4* repeat another 4 times total 45 sts *k3 cdd k3* repeat another 4 times total 35 sts *k2 cdd k2* repeat another 4 times total 25 sts *k1 cdd k1* repeat another 4 times total 15 sts cut yarn using a tapestry needle thread through all live sts and pull to tighten center weave in all loose ends block to shape star attach a velvet ribbon to hang the ornament enjoy please email me with any concerns and comments i would love to hear what you think and to offer assistance as i am able adella hashtags #woolmadestar #woolmadeshop email woolmadeshop@gmail com instagram @woolmadeshop website woolmadeshop com this pattern is property of woolmade shop and cannot be duplicated or used for items intended for sale without permission
